trans-unit.source: Represents a callback delegate that has been registered with a <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />.
The callback is called when the token is canceled.
To unregister a callback, dispose the corresponding Registration instance.
trans-unit.target: Для отмены регистрации обратного вызова dispose соответствующий экземпляр Registration.

trans-unit.source: For more information and code examples see [Cancellation in Managed Threads](~/docs/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads.md).
trans-unit.target: Дополнительные сведения и примеры кода см. [Отмена в управляемых потоках](~/docs/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads.md).

trans-unit.source: All public and protected members of <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads, with the exception of Dispose, which must only be used when all other operations on the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> have completed.
trans-unit.target: Все открытые и защищенные члены <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> являются потокобезопасными и могут быть использованы одновременно из нескольких потоков, за исключением Dispose, который должен быть только используется, когда все операции в <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> завершена.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> class.
Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration>.
trans-unit.target: Вызовите метод `Dispose` по окончании использования класса <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration>.

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Метод `Dispose` оставляет класс <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration> в непригодном для использования состоянии.

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: После вызова метода `Dispose`, необходимо освободить все ссылки на <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration> , сборщик мусора мог освободить память, <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration> занимаемую.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Дополнительные сведения см. в разделе [очистки неуправляемых ресурсов](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) и [метода](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration>.
trans-unit.target: Всегда вызывайте метод `Dispose` перед освобождением последней ссылки на класс <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: В противном случае используемые им ресурсы не будут освобождены до тех пор, пока сборщик мусора не вызовет для объекта <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration> метод `Finalize`.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> instance is equal to the specified <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" />.
The other object to which to compare this instance.
Determines whether the current <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> instance is equal to the specified <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" />.
True, if both this and <paramref name="obj" /> are equal.
False, otherwise.

Two <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> instances are equal if they both refer to the output of a single call to the same Register method of a <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />.
The other <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> to which to compare this instance.
Determines whether the current <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> instance is equal to the specified <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" />.
True, if both this and <paramref name="other" /> are equal.
False, otherwise.

Two <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> instances are equal if they both refer to the output of a single call to the same Register method of a <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationToken" />.
Serves as a hash function for a <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" />.
A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> instance.
The first instance.
The second instance.
Determines whether two <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> instances are equal.
True if the instances are equal; otherwise, false.
The first instance.
The second instance.
Determines whether two <see cref="T:System.Threading.CancellationTokenRegistration" /> instances are not equal.
True if the instances are not equal; otherwise, false.
